post.text: I had an incredible time in Detroit yesterday. A great experience - learned a lot by listening to everyone. I am grateful for their support - and time. You can catch what I had to say to everyone, right here. Thank you! -DJT

comment.author: Courtney
comment.text: Listening? I thought a president knows it all and didn't need to listen. Just dictate and preach to us slaves.

replies.author: Karsta
replies.text: Yeah you really look like a slave.

replies.author: Courtney
replies.text: Karsta it's called a metaphor. We are all being enslaved economically and other means by an oppressing and self serving government. A government who thinks we work for them and not the other way around. So yes I am a slave and you are too. You just don't realize it.

replies.author: Andrea
replies.text: Amen Courtney I heard that. Good morning brother have a great day
